inclusion.criterion: diagnosis of relapsed or refractory glioblastoma multiforme (GBM), anaplastic astrocytoma (AA) or anaplastic mixed oligoastrocytoma (AOA)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Karnofsky performance status greater or equal to 60%
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: expected survival of greater or equal to three months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: male or female patients of greater or equal 18 years of age
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients previously treated with more than 6 cycles (28 days each) of Bevacizumab at 10/mg/kg
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Women who are pregnant or lactating
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and is being treated with Avastin. They meet several inclusion criteria, but have not been previously treated with Bevacizumab.
